## Overview

This page provides links to several static map visualizations related to the Curaçao census data.

### Available Maps

* [**Geographic Discrepancies (2023 vs. 2011)**](./geozone_discrepancies_b2021_b2011c.html){target="_blank"}
    * This map shows the differences in geozones between the 2011 and 2023 census boundaries.

* [**Grouped Areas (2023 vs. 2011)**](./grouped_2021_2011_areas.html){target="_blank"}
    * This map visualizes how the newer 2023 neighborhood definitions can be grouped to align with the older 2011 census areas.

* [**Nuisance Map**](./nuisance_map.html){target="_blank"}
    * A thematic map displaying household reports of various nuisances (e.g., air pollution, noise) from the 2023 census data.
